title: Pokemon Movie 02: Maboroshi no Pokemon Lugia Bakutan
synopsis: An ancient prophecy tells of a day when the titans of ice, lightning, and fire are disturbed. When this occurs, Lugia, the guardian of the sea, will rise up and restore harmony. Enchanted by the words of the prophecy, Gelardan, a Pok√©mon collector, sets out on his airship with a dreadful plan to capture Lugia by going after these three titans.
